Module org.eclipse.persistence.core
Package org.eclipse.persistence.platform.xml.jaxp

Class JAXPPlatform

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.persistence.platform.xml.jaxp.JAXPPlatform
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLPlatform
public class JAXPPlatform extends Object implements XMLPlatform

Purpose: An implementation of XMLPlatform using JAXP 1.3 APIs.
